**EZ108-230218 Crane Inspection and Certification**

### Solicitation Information

**Solicitation Number:** WS3538127728

**Publication Date:** November 7, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2022, **14:00:00**

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Anthony, Mitch (SPAC/PSPC), 
* **Email:** mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### General Notice

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for an annual inspection, certification, and repair/maintenance for six cranes and lifting devices at the Esquimalt Graving Dock. A competitive solicitation process is managed through SAP Ariba with follow-up information available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14569517](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14569517).

A formal Request for Proposal was announced through this solicitation for an annual inspection, certification, repair, and maintenance service of six cranes and lifting devices at the Esquimalt Graving Dock. The selected contractor will be accountable for final approval and certification of lifting devices.

### Project Scope

The solicitation includes a comprehensive schedule for bidding and evaluation improved to expand incentives to foster an open bidding process that can improve local trade.

Special arrangements related to accelerated commercial arrangements have been factored into the shortlisted incumbent bidder submissions to give equivalent solicitation discounts.

### Regional Opportunities

Esquimalt Graving Dock installation certifications will be awarded in British Columbia, Canada.
